pull.title: Add `noverify_tests` to `.gitignore`
pull.body: This is a follow up of #1188.

repo.name: secp256k1
repo.description: Optimized C library for EC operations on curve secp256k1

repo.name: secp256k1
repo.description: Optimized C library for EC operations on curve secp256k1

verification.payload:
tree 70d7ddfe7601bf12897db73ae0554e2b4fbf5515
parent 88e80722d2a13b01f666ae0f418a118062c2b9af
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1673635617 +0000
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1673635617 +0000

Add `noverify_tests` to `.gitignore`

issue.title: Upstream PRs 1160, 1193, 1169, 1190, 1192, 1194, 1196, 1195, 1170, 1172, 1200, 1199, 1203, 1201, 1206, 1078, 1209, 979, 1212, 1218, 1217, 1221, 1222
issue.body:
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1160]: Makefile: add `-I$(top_srcdir)/{include,src}` to `CPPFLAGS` for precomputed
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1193]: Add `noverify_tests` to `.gitignore`
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1169]: Add support for msan instead of valgrind (for memcheck and ctime test)
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1190]: Make all non-API functions (except main) static
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1192]: Switch to exhaustive groups with small B coefficient
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1194]: Ensure safety of ctz_debruijn implementation.
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1196]: Drop no longer used variables from the build system
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1195]: ctime_tests: improve output when CHECKMEM_RUNNING is not defined
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1170]: contexts: Forbid destroying, cloning and randomizing the static context
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1172]: benchmarks: fix bench_scalar_split
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1200]: Drop no longer used Autoheader macros
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1199]: ci: Minor improvements inspired by Bitcoin Core
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1203]: Do not link `bench` and `ctime_tests` to `COMMON_LIB`
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1201]: ci: Do not set git's `user.{email,name}` config options
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1206]: build: Add -Wreserved-identifier supported by clang
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1078]: group: Save a normalize_to_zero in gej_add_ge
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1209]: build: Add SECP256K1_API_VAR to fix importing variables from DLLs
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#979]: Native jacobi symbol algorithm
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1212]: Prevent dead-store elimination when clearing secrets in examples
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1218]: Update overflow check
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1217]: Add secp256k1_fe_add_int function
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1221]: Update Changelog
[bitcoin-core/secp256k1#1222]: Remove redundant checks.

- made -zkp functions static where possible
- CTIMETEST -> CTIMETESTS
- VG_CHECK_VERIFY(r->n, sizeof(r->n)); -> SECP256K1_CHECKMEM_CHECK_VERIFY

The next PR introduces cmake.
